content_text:
Welcome to Introduction to Web Development

This course covers HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frameworks.
Ask general questions about the course here.
This week we cover the basics of HTML5: semantic elements, forms, and document structure.

Semantic HTML

Learn about header, nav, main, article, section, and footer elements.
Create a personal portfolio page using only HTML5 semantic elements.
Post your questions about HTML fundamentals here.
Dive into CSS3: selectors, box model, Flexbox, and Grid layout.

Flexbox Layout

Flexbox provides a one-dimensional layout method for arranging items in rows or columns.
Design and build a responsive landing page using CSS Flexbox and Grid.
Test your knowledge of CSS selectors, specificity, and the cascade.
Introduction to JavaScript: variables, functions, DOM manipulation, and event handling.
Build an interactive to-do list application using vanilla JavaScript.
Questions covering variables, data types, functions, and basic DOM manipulation.
Please share your thoughts on the course so far.
